string-array.name: evaluation_license_dsc
string-array.item:
iWedia shall have the right (without any obligation), at its sole discretion, to deliver updated versions of the Live TV app. The terms and conditions of this Evaluation License shall apply to any new version of the Live TV app.

There is no obligation to give iWedia any suggestions, comments or other feedback regarding the Live TV app ("Feedback"). However, any Feedback that is voluntarily provided may be used in iWedia products and related specifications or other documentation. Accordingly, if iWedia receives any Feedback on any version of the Live TV app, iWedia may freely use, disclose, reproduce, license, distribute and otherwise commercialize the Feedback in any iWedia product, technology, service, specification or other documentation.
Live TV app is the confidential information of iWedia ("Confidential Information") provided under NDA.\n\n

iWedia provides the software "AS IS" and without any warranty of any kind, express or implied; iWedia disclaims all warranties and conditions of any kind.

iWedia shall have no liability or obligation with respect to any subject matter of this Evaluation License for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, punitive or consequential damages under any theory of liability whether in tort, contract, negligence, strict liability or otherwise even if advised of the possibility of such damages.

iWedia will not be liable for any loss of use, interruption of business, including without limitation lost profits, regardless of the form of action, even if iWedia has been advised of the possibility of such damages.
This Evaluation License shall constitute the binding agreement of the parties. This Evaluation License may not be changed, terminated or amended.\n

Use Left button on D-Pad to open Channel List

Suitable for all audiences. Programs may contain mild violence, language and mature situations.
Suitable for ages 13 and up. Programs may contain mild to moderate language and mild violence and sexual references.
Suitable for ages 16 and up. Programs may contain more intensive violence and coarse language, partial nudity and moderate sexual references.
Suitable for mature audiences only. Programs contain strong violence, coarse language and explicit sexual references.
Material classified P is intended for preschool children.
Material classified C is intended for children (other than preschool children) who are younger than 14 years of age.
Material classified G is not necessarily intended for children but it must be very mild in impact and must not contain any matter likely to be unsuitable for children to watch without supervision.
Material classified PG may contain adult themes or concepts but must be mild in impact and remain suitable for children to watch with supervision.
Material classified M is for mature audiences. It is recommended for viewing only by persons aged 15 years or over.

Material classified MA is suitable for viewing only by persons aged 15 years or over because of the intensity and/or frequency of violence, sexual depictions, or coarse language, adult themes or drug use. The impact may be strong.

Material classified AV is suitable for viewing only by persons aged 15 years or over. It is unsuitable for MA classification because of the intensity and/or frequency of violence, or because violence is central to the theme. In other respects, the requirements of the classification are identical to the MA classification.
Material classified R is legally restricted to adults. Some material classified R may be offensive to sections of the adult community.
Exempt programming includes: news, sports, documentaries and other information programming; talk shows, music videos, and variety programming.
This programming is intended for younger children under the age of 8 years.
This programming is intended for youngsters 8 years and over. It is suggested that a parent/guardian co-view programming assigned this classification with younger children under the age of 8.
This programming is intended for all age groups and appropriate viewing for the entire family.

This programming, while intended for a general audience, may not be suitable for younger children (under the age of 8). Parents/guardians should be aware that there might be content elements which some could consider inappropriate for unsupervised viewing by children in the 8-13 age range.

Programming with this classification contains themes or content elements which might not be suitable for viewers under the age of 14. Parents are strongly cautioned to exercise discretion in permitting viewing by pre-teens and early teens without parent/guardian supervision, as programming with this classification could deal with mature themes and societal issues in a realistic fashion.
This programming is intended for viewers 18 years and older.
The program is appropriate for viewing by persons of all ages. A program with a "G" rating might offend the sensibilities of children under eight years of age.

The program is suitable for the general public but could contain mild or occasional violence that may disturb young children. Viewing with adult supervision is therefore recommended for young children (age 8 and under).
The program is appropriate for viewing by persons 13 years of age or older. Children under 13 may be admitted only if accompanied by an adult.

The program is appropriate for viewing by persons 16 years of age or older. Programs with this rating present troubling themes, situations or behaviours and adopt a more direct point of view about things.

The program is appropriate for viewing by persons 18 years of age or older. Programs reserved for adults most often deal primarily with the representation of explicit sexual encounters. They may also be extremely violent, showing scenes of hyperrealistic cruelty, torture and horror.
Programs do not contain material inappropriate for all ages, and thus are suitable for all ages.
Programs may contain material inappropriate for children under 7, and therefore parental discretion should be used for them.
Programs may contain material inappropriate for children under 12, and therefore parental discretion should be used for them.
Programs may contain material inappropriate for audiences under 15, and therefore parental discretion should be used for them.
Programs may contain material inappropriate for audiences under 19, and thus are not suitable for youngsters under 19.
Suitable for all but parents should guide their young.
Suitable for persons aged 13 and above but parental guidance is advised for children below 13.
Suitable for persons aged 16 and above.
Suitable for persons aged 18 and above.
Suitable for adults aged 21 and above.
This program is designed to be appropriate for all children.
This program is designed for children age 7 and above.
Most parents would find this program suitable for all ages.
This program contains material that parents may find unsuitable for younger children. Many parents may want to watch it with their younger children.
This program contains some material that many parents would find unsuitable for children under 14 years of age.
This program is specifically designed to be viewed by adults and therefore may be unsuitable for children under 17.
General audiences. Nothing that would offend parents for viewing by children.
Parental guidance suggested. May contain some material parents might not like for their young children.
Parents strongly cautioned. Some material may be inappropriate for pre-teenagers.
Restricted, Contains some adult material. Parents are urged to learn more about the film before taking their young children with them.
No one 17 and under admitted. Clearly adult. Children are not admitted.
Programmes which exclude material likely to be unsuitable for children. Programmes may not necessarily be designed for child viewers but should not contain material likely to alarm or distress them.
Programmes containing material more suited for mature audiences but not necessarily unsuitable for child viewers when subject to the guidance of a parent or an adult.
Programmes containing adult themes and directed primarily at mature audiences.
Suitable for audiences 3 to 5 years of age.
Suitable for audiences 6 to 12 years of age.
Parental guidance suggested for viewers age below 13.
Parental guidance suggested for viewers age below 18.
Not suitable for children and teenagers.
Suitable for person aged 13 and above. And parental guidance for children under 13
Suitable for person aged 18 and above. And parental guidance for children under 18

Please press More Info to read TOS and activate Streaming + Broadcast TV
Please click below to learn more about the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy that apply when you use the Live TV App.
Send feedback about the Live TVˣ experience
Please include the following in your feedback
1. Description of your issue including what steps you were\n taking when it occurred, expected resul, and observer\n result.
2. If possible, please attach a video or photo of the issue\n within the email.
In order to watch Live channels, please restart your TV
Do you want to delete all channels? After deleting, application will reset and you will have to scan channels again.
In case of troubles with broadcast channels, please try to delete channels.
1. Description of your issue including what steps you were\n taking when it occurred, expected resul, and observer\n result.
2. If possible, please attach a video or photo of the issue\n within the email.
"Teletext features are not available for this channel."
Are you sure that you want to reset device ID?
